meanings.definition: Having more prominent or bulging eyes.
meanings.sent1: The frog looked gogglier than the others in the pond.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the gogglier eyes of the owl in the tree.
meanings.sent3: The gogglier goldfish seemed to be staring right at me.
meanings.sent4: Her gogglier gaze made it hard to look away.
meanings.sent5: The gogglier eyes of the chameleon seemed to follow her every move.

meanings.sent1: The puppy with the gogglier expression melted everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent2: He had the gogglier look of surprise on his face.
meanings.sent3: The gogglier teddy bear in the shop window caught her eye.
meanings.sent4: Her gogglier smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The gogglier cartoon character made the children giggle.

meanings.sent1: She stared gogglier at the magic trick than anyone else.
meanings.sent2: The owl blinked gogglier than usual.
meanings.sent3: He looked around the room gogglier than a curious child.
meanings.sent4: The robot moved gogglier as it scanned the area.
meanings.sent5: The comedian's jokes made the audience laugh gogglier than before.
